label: Courageous
description: Acts despite fear, enabling decisive moves when stakes are high. Pairs with warrior or rebel archetypes; offsets reputational damage and counters internal conflict rooted in doubt.

label: Compassionate
description: Feels and responds to others’ suffering. Supports caregiver/healer roles and can temper harsher motivations (revenge) by reframing goals toward protection or mercy.

label: Loyal
description: Prioritizes commitment to people or causes. Interlocks with destiny (oaths lead to sacrifice) and can conflict with secrets or occupations requiring duplicity (spy, diplomat).

label: Honest
description: Values truth even at cost. Creates friction with spy/assassin archetypes; builds strong reputations but may trigger external conflict with corrupt systems.

label: Patient
description: Tolerates delay and hardship without rash action. Synergizes with strategist or mentor roles; may clash with motivations requiring speed (rescue under time crunch).

label: Resourceful
description: Finds unconventional solutions under constraints. Supports explorer/ranger, offsets lack of power or status, and reframes external conflict as solvable puzzles.

label: Humble
description: Understates ability, inviting trust and learning. Counters hubris as a fatal flaw and strengthens mentor-mentee dynamics.

label: Curious
description: Seeks knowledge and novelty. Fuels scholar/magician/archetypes; can conflict with secrets and trigger plot by opening forbidden doors.

label: Empathetic
description: Reads and resonates with emotions. Bolsters diplomat/leader roles and mitigates reputational damage by building bridges across factions.

label: Resilient
description: Recovers from setbacks, sustaining motivation across long arcs. Harmonizes with tragic backstories and helps characters outlast oppressive external forces.

label: Creative
description: Generates fresh ideas or aesthetics. Amplifies creator/artist roles; can reframe external conflict into expressive action and supports visionary destinies.

label: Disciplined
description: Maintains focus and habits over time. Suits warrior/monk/engineer types; counters impulsive flaws and stabilizes teams.

label: Generous
description: Shares resources and credit. Enhances caregiver/leader reputations and challenges scarcity-driven motivations.

label: Diligent
description: Applies sustained effort and care. Interlocks with occupations requiring precision (judge, engineer); destiny rewards diligence with mastery arcs.

label: Adaptable
description: Shifts tactics when conditions change. Vital for explorers and spies; reduces risk from rigid fatal flaws.

label: Wise
description: Integrates knowledge with judgment. Powers mentor/sage roles; can challenge rash motivations and prevent avoidable tragedy.

label: Brave
description: Faces danger head-on. Similar to courage but more physical expression; often the tipping point in external conflict set pieces.

label: Just/Fair
description: Balances competing claims impartially. Supports judge/ruler archetypes; collides with corrupt institutions and exposes secrets.

label: Optimistic
description: Expects good outcomes, sustaining morale. Useful in bleak settings; may blind to risks (creating internal conflict with pragmatism).

label: Strategic
description: Thinks in systems and long horizons. Supports leader/strategist archetypes and reframes motivation into achievable plans.

label: Charismatic
description: Inspires followership through presence and speech. Amplifies leader/ruler destinies; can mask flaws or secrets.

label: Protective
description: Defends others instinctively. Powers guardian/healer arcs; can escalate external conflict when threats arise.

label: Determined
description: Refuses to quit, converting motivation into action. Interacts with fatal flaws (obsession) and can tip into self-destruction if unbalanced.

label: Pragmatic
description: Chooses workable solutions over ideals. Harmonizes with engineer/merchant roles; clashes with zealotry or prophetic certainty.

label: Reflective
description: Thinks deeply about choices and consequences. Defuses impulsive traits and strengthens internal conflict arcs.

label: Perceptive
description: Notices subtleties others miss. Core for detective/spy; exposes secrets and shifts reputations.

label: Tolerant
description: Accepts difference without prejudice. Stabilizes diverse teams and counteracts bigoted external forces.

label: Gracious
description: Extends kindness in victory and loss. Softens reputational edges and supports healing after conflict.

label: Forgiving
description: Releases justified resentment. Resolves internal conflict arcs and can avert tragic destinies.

label: Open‑minded
description: Considers unfamiliar ideas fairly. Supports explorer/scholar roles and defuses culture‑clash conflicts.

label: Dependable
description: Can be counted on under pressure. Builds reputation capital and offsets chaos-prone teammates.

label: Supportive
description: Elevates others’ performance. Enables mentor/leader dynamics and improves group outcomes.

label: Tenacious
description: Clings to goals doggedly. Great for underdogs; can inflate to obsession (fatal flaw) when unchecked.

label: Altruistic
description: Sacrifices for others with minimal self-interest. Pairs with caregiver/hero destinies like martyrdom; risks burnout.

label: Cooperative
description: Works smoothly in teams. Mitigates internal conflict and amplifies collective strategy.

label: Decisive
description: Commits to a course quickly with conviction. Crucial in crisis; can conflict with reflective or consensus-led cultures.

label: Meticulous
description: Sweats details others ignore. Valuable in judge/engineer/detective roles; risk of paralysis if overused.

label: Persuasive
description: Moves minds through argument or story. Key for diplomat/bard; ethically ambiguous when paired with dark motivations.

label: Playful
description: Uses humor and spontaneity to energize. Complements jester/trickster archetypes; can defuse or inflame tension.

label: Innovative
description: Pushes boundaries to invent better ways. Pairs with creator/engineer; invites external resistance from tradition.

label: Integrity‑driven
description: Aligns action with values even when costly. Strengthens reputation and resolves internal dissonance.

label: Imaginative
description: Visualizes possibilities beyond constraints. Fuels visionary arcs; enables lateral solutions in external conflict.

label: Observant
description: Attends to people and environments keenly. Enhances scouting, investigation, and social inference.

label: Self‑aware
description: Recognizes one’s own patterns and limits. Damps fatal flaws before they escalate; deepens internal arcs.

label: Steadfast
description: Holds course under pressure. Stabilizes teams and sustains long campaigns; risk of rigidity when paired with pride.

label: Tactful
description: Speaks truth in ways others can hear. Empowers diplomacy and leadership; reduces reputational blowback.

label: Intuitive
description: Trusts pattern-sense and gut. Useful when data is sparse; tension arises when it contradicts analysis.

label: Visionary
description: Sees trajectories and meaning others miss. Anchors movement-building destinies; can clash with pragmatists.

label: Grounded
description: Keeps perspective amid hype or panic. Balances visionary or charismatic teammates; protects from swings in reputation.

label: Sociable
description: Builds broad networks naturally. Unlocks resources and information; vulnerable to secrets/exploitation.
